title: Special topic
content: Seniors....Which is best topic to choose for 4th sem cse?

comments.body: Where did you get this form from ???
Exactly , ec campus peeps didn't get this shit right ?
We got an email to choose a special topic for 4th semester. I think AIML students haven't received this mail.
We already did oop with c++ in sem 3
I would say Go or Rust. They are popular modern languages and a great skill to have.
Then I would suggest RUST programming, very relevant in the industry
Oh nice, ec campus  didn't get the email though :(
